channel.title: million on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in million on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-09
item.description: Reddit to reportedly tokenize karma points and onboard 500M new users (2 minute read) Reddit is planning to convert its users’ karma points into Ethereum-based tokens.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-27
item.description: Apple to establish North Carolina campus, increase U.S. spending targets (2 minute read) Apple will establish a new campus in North Carolina, expand its operation in several other US states, and increase its spending targets with US suppliers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-23
item.description: Charli D’Amelio hits 100 million TikTok followers (3 minute read) Charli D’Amelio has reached 100 million followers on TikTok.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-31
item.description: Huawei tops Samsung as world’s No. 1 smartphone company for first time (2 minute read) Huawei has surpassed Samsung as the world’s number one supplier of smartphones.
